Subskills.name: Wider Chain
Subskills.description: Increases the attack area of effect radius of chainslaw slash.

Subskills.name: Accelerated Chain
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by chainsaw slash.

Subskills.name: Giant Slash
Subskills.description: Every 4th attack unleashes a giant slash dealing increased damage and inflicting armor break.

Subskills.name: Double The Logging
Subskills.description: Chance to attach an additional chainsaw on hit.

Subskills.name: Rupturing Slash
Subskills.description: Chance on inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Chaining Uppercut
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to send monsters airborne dealing increased area of effect damage when landing.

Subskills.name: The Motor Goes BRRRRR
Subskills.description: Increases chainsaw slash attack speed while wielding a chainsaw.

Subskills.name: Bigger Saw
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius and size of rotating chainsaws.

Subskills.name: Sawing Momentum
Subskills.description: Enemies killed while a chainsaw is attached to them release the chainsaws outwards. If they hit a new target, they attach themselves to them instead.

Subskills.name: Strengthened Bloodlust
Subskills.description: Increases rotating chainsaw damage and size based on your total strength.

Subskills.name: Malfunctioning Chainsaw
Subskills.description: Chainsaws explode after expiring dealing additional damage and stunning nearby enemies.

Subskills.name: Bloody Carnage
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding enemies.

Subskills.name: Woodcutter's Madness
Subskills.description: Every 3rd hit unleashes a spinning attack with increased radius and dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Gas To The Chainsaws
Subskills.description: Each target can only have one chainsaw attached to them but striking them again causes it to reset its duration, growing in size and dealing additional damage up to 10 times.
